system.special: Daemon Wep, Concussive (2), Flexible, Gyro-Stabilised, Snare (2), Tearing
system.note: Weapon: Whip. Daemon WP 69 (Slaaneshi Daemon), Bind Str 3 . Att.: Howling, Lashing, Shrieking. Must be Dedicated to Slaanesh to wield. Gain Fear(+1) on any turn attacking with weapon.
